todo-projects.title: AI-Powered Face Recognition Attendance System
todo-projects.description: A web-based attendance system that uses face recognition for authentication. Admins can register users, and attendance is marked automatically when a user is recognized.

todo-projects.title: Smart Expense Tracker
todo-projects.description: A mobile and web application that helps users track their income and expenses, offering insights through data visualization and budget management.

todo-projects.title: Real-Time Chat Application
todo-projects.description: A real-time chat app with private and group messaging, end-to-end encryption, and a notification system.

todo-projects.title: AI-Powered Resume Analyzer
todo-projects.description: A web-based tool that analyzes resumes and provides feedback based on job descriptions using AI and NLP.

todo-projects.title: Cybersecurity Threat Detection System
todo-projects.description: A system that detects and logs potential security threats using AI-powered anomaly detection.

todo-projects.title: AI-Powered Code Review Assistant
todo-projects.description: An AI-based tool that reviews code for best practices, performance issues, and security vulnerabilities.

todo-projects.title: E-commerce Platform with AI Recommendations
todo-projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with AI-driven personalized product recommendations.

todo-projects.title: Machine Learning-Powered Chatbot
todo-projects.description: A chatbot that provides automated responses and learns from interactions using NLP techniques.

todo-projects.title: IoT-Based Smart Home System
todo-projects.description: A web and mobile dashboard to control IoT devices for a smart home system, including real-time monitoring and automation.

todo-projects.title: Personalized Learning Platform
todo-projects.description: A learning management system that personalizes study materials based on user progress and AI-generated recommendations.
